pages.text: $(li)Added $(bold)Personal Dimension Keys$()! $(li)Personal Dimension Keys are craftable as soon as you craft your first key and keyhole. $(li)Personal Dimension Keys will 'bind' to the player that activates them, and all keys activated by the same player will lead to the same place.
$(li)Added $(bold)Teleporter Hub Keys$()! $(li)Teleporter Hub Keys can be found in advanced dungeons. $(li)Exiting a portal in any dimension now causes you to face away from that portal.
